title: Research Ethics & IRB
summary: Comprehensive guidelines ensuring all university research meets national and international ethical standards. Includes IRB review procedures, consent protocols, and compliance monitoring for studies involving human subjects, animals, or environmental impact.

title: Intellectual Property (IPR) Policy
summary: Detailed framework for protecting intellectual property developed at UAP. Covers patent filing processes, royalty distribution (40% to inventors), and commercialization rights for university-funded research outputs.

title: Technology Transfer Policy
summary: Procedures for licensing university-developed technologies to industry partners. Includes startup incubation support, revenue sharing models (50% inventor, 30% department, 20% ORIC), and other success metrics.
